Sentencas: Strontium-lanthanum-aluminoborosilicate (SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2) (SLABS) glass was prepared for sealant material in planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (pSOFC).
Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Sentencas: Differential Thermal Analysis of the glass showed the formation of two crystalline phases, first one 807 degrees C and the second phase at 1021 degrees C. Crystallization kinetic of the first crystalline phase was investigated by differential thermal analysis (DTA) and using the JMA-kinetic model.
Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Sentencas: The activation energy for crystallization was calculated to be 114.04 kJ/mol with frequency factor 5.9 x 10(3).
Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Sentencas: Coefficient of Thermal Expansion (CTE) of the glass was measured to be 9.72 x 10(-6)/degrees C. Optical band gap of the glass was measured to be 3.07 eV. Conductivity measured by Impedance spectroscopy found to be 5.68 x 10(-7)
Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant
Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant

Sentencas: Wetting behavior of the glass on a ferritic steel substrate was investigated under hot stage microscopy.
Titulo: Investigation of crystallization kinetic of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass and its suitability for SOFC sealant
